data.name: RPG Maker MV - Time Fantasy Add-on: Dwarves Vs Elves
data.detailed_description:
Create new realms for your world inhabited with elves and dwarves! This expansion pack includes 32 new character sprites, with walking and emotion animations. Sixteen elves and sixteen dwarves, with a variety of classes and archetypes for each race.

Created in the iconic retro style of Time Fantasy series, this fun-sized pack is a great addition to your growing RPG Maker library.

Features:

  • 32 new characters that expand on the Time Fantasy style.
  • Characters have walking sprites as well as emotion animations.
  • Includes warriors, wizards, royalty, and other classes for both races.
  • Compatible with RPG Maker MV

data.short_description: A collection of new character sprites in the Time Fantasy style.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
